segments.text: I notice the girl standing by the boy, her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s been promised something sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on the stool, and it looks like he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to be in big trouble if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s posture is so expectant, like she’s waiting for a gift.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I can almost hear it crashing to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s plate is already full of cookies, and he’s still reaching for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t break anything when the stool falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
